comments:
Build ID: M20070921-1145

Steps To Reproduce:
1. upgrade to leopard
2. start eclipse
3. wait for the random shutdown

More information:
At first the eclipse I was using was a little bloated, reinstalled a fresh eclipse with only windowbuilder pro as an extra plugin, but the crashing continues.
